dict.acceptation: 警卫；狱吏，看守；护卫队；防护装置；
保卫，守护；看守；加防护装置；谨慎使用；

sent.orig: "You can talk for five minutes," the guard said quietly."The next guard arrives at 12.15."
sent.trans: “你们可以谈五分钟，”那个卫兵悄悄说，“下一班卫兵十二点一刻来。”

sent.orig: He is a much better fast break guard as opposed to court offense type of guard.
sent.trans: 他是一个非常好的快攻控卫，而不是一个半场进攻类型的控卫。

sent.orig: Governor Beshear has deployed Kentucky's Army National Guard and part of the Air Guard.
sent.trans: 州长比希尔出动了大批肯塔基州国民警卫队及部分航空自卫队。

sent.orig: If you can't guard one on one, don't guard him one on one.
sent.trans: 结果你让姚明打得很惨。如果你不能防住一个人，那么就不要一个人去防他。

sent.orig: Beside the regular guard Scotty there was a guard she never saw before.
sent.trans: 除了平常的保安员司各迪之外，还有一个她从没见过的保安员。
